---
title: "Welcome to IS381!"
author: "Jason Bryer"
date: "2025-03-13"
image: "00-welcome.png"
description: "Important information on how to get started with this course. Please read this post carefully."
---

::: {.cell}

:::





Welcome to IS38! Couple of important notes as you get started:

* Complete this [Google Form](https://forms.gle/sXrP9X7ZK2dXv2Lu6) as soon as possible. I will use some of the data (in aggregate) in the meetup.

* [Join the Slack channel by clicking here](https://cuny-msds.slack.com/archives/C09B31HKH9C) (or use your @sps.cuny.edu email address). This will be our primary mode of communication. 

* For private communications, you can either send private Slack messages or email me at [jason.bryer@cuny.edu](mailto:jason.bryer@cuny.edu?subject=IS381).

* Complete the self-regulated learning assessment in DAACS. Visit [cuny.daacs.net](https://cuny.daacs.net) and sign-in using your CUNY acocunt.

* Our Meetups will be on Monday from 6:30pm to 7:30pm. **I expect everyone to attend or watch the Meetups.** Important information will be shared during the meetups that will not be available in any other format.

I am looking forward to getting to know everyone and a fantastic semester! Good luck!
